exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat st : network H_reach : reachable step_async step_async_init st H_locks : Client_index H : held (nwState st (Client H_locks)) = true Unable to unify "Client_index" with "exists t : list Client_index, queue (nwState st Server) = H_locks :: t".

In environment num_Clients : nat st : network H_reach : reachable step_async step_async_init st H_locks : Client_index H : held (nwState st (Client H_locks)) = true Unable to unify "reachable step_async step_async_init st" with "exists t : list Client_index, queue (nwState st Server) = H_locks :: t".

original: intros st H_reach H_locks. unfold locks_correct. intros n H_held. apply H_locks. apply H_reach. apply H_held.
